amendment.description: To impose a fee of 8 cents per barrel on oil transported through the pipeline.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 121 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 57 - 38. Record Vote Number: 25.
Amendment SA 121 proposed by Senator Carper to Amendment SA 2. (consideration: CR S402, S406; text: CR S402) To impose a fee of 8 cents per barrel on oil transported through the pipeline.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 121 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 57 - 38. Record Vote Number: 25.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 121 proposed by Senator Carper to Amendment SA 2.
